issue.title: Flat mapping of collection with optional
issue.body:
Hi, 

Take a look on http://short-coding-notes.blogspot.cz/2014/09/flatten-list-of-optional-values-in-java.html

Is it implemented somehow in streamex? 

Best,
Stas

issue.title: skipLast(long n)
New method skipSorted(n) in StreamEx

body: I'm loving chain()!  I just realized that chain() can be used as an intermediate or terminal operator.
